description: the continuous scroll works very well
i thought that a manga reader finnaly came out but i was wrong so i hate it

This is the only desktop reader I've seen for any OS that has vertical scrolling, which is nice. The UI is makes sense and stays out of the way. No option to change the upscale algorithm (like cdisplayex) but I can always upscale before reading so not really a con.
A vertical scrolling image viewer. It's one of those things you never think you'd use but actually come to be pretty useful.
summary: Does what it's supposed to do

description: Works exactly as says, ease of use, & very organized! I "didn't" get this for nhentai... lol

You can actually set the page spacing to 0 and that is awesome for webtoons. There are some features that are missing such as being able to go to the next chapter/folder in the full screen mode, a highlight of the chapter/folder you were reading before closing the application....
